content: ðŸ“‚Â Reference â†’ Airnode â†’ v1.0 â†’ Deployment Files â†’ Templates  secrets.env [#] (#frontmatter-title)  ==  The secrets.env contains the secrets that the respective Airnode deployments will need. All variables defined in a secrets.env can be interpolated inside config.json. For more details, see the full description of the [secrets.env] (./../deployment-files/secrets-env.html) file. ---Variable names cannot contain dashes (-) or start with a number. shAIRNODE_WALLET_MNEMONIC="<FILL_*>" CHAIN_PROVIDER_URL="<FILL_*>" SS_API_KEY="<FILL_*>" HEARTBEAT_API_KEY="<FILL_*>" HEARTBEAT_URL="<FILL_*>" # Used for GCP only GCP_PROJECT_ID="<FILL_*>"  1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 [Previous pageconfig.json] (/reference/airnode/latest/deployment-files/templates/config-json.html)  [Next pageaws.env] (/reference/airnode/latest/deployment-files/templates/aws-env.html)
